SELECT A.LEC_ID , E.SJT_NAME, E.SJT_CREDIT, B.USER_NAME, (SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE) AS SEMS_DATE
FROM LEC A INNER JOIN USERS B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) INNER JOIN PLANOK C ON(A.LEC_ID = C.LEC_ID) INNER JOIN PLAN D ON(C.PLAN_NO = D.PLAN_NO) INNER JOIN SJT E ON(D.SJT_ID = E.SJT_ID) INNER JOIN CLS F ON(A.LEC_ID=F.LEC_ID AND A.LEC_SEMS=F.LEC_SEMS) WHERE F.USER_NO=#{userNo} AND A.LEC_SEMS= (SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE)
SELECT COUNT(*) from(SELECT A.* FROM USERS A INNER JOIN CLS B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE LEC_SEMS=#{lecSems} AND LEC_ID=#{lecId}) WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}

SELECT A.lecbo_no as bo_no ,A.lecbo_info ,A.lecbo_title ,A.lecbo_content ,A.lecbo_hit ,TO_CHAR(A.lecbo_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') AS LECBO_DATE ,A.lec_sems ,A.lec_id ,A.user_no as usernoo ,A.lec_div ,B.attch_no ,B.board_no ,B.notice_no ,B.attch_fname ,B.attch_sname ,B.attch_mime ,B.attch_size ,B.attch_fsize ,B.attch_dhit ,B.plan_no ,B.ojt_no ,B.user_no2 ,C.USER_NAME FROM LECBO A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTCH B ON(A.LECBO_NO = B.LECBO_NO) INNER JOIN USERS C ON(A.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE A.lecbo_no=#{lecboNo}

SELECT distinct A.lec_sems ,A.lec_id ,A.user_no ,A.lec_pers ,A.lec_sts ,D.SJT_ID ,D.SJT_NAME ,D.SJT_CREDIT ,D.SJT_MAJOR ,D.SJT_GRADE ,E.ROOM_NO ,E.GWAN_NAME ,(SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE) AS SEMS_DATE
FROM LEC A INNER JOIN PLANOK B ON(A.LEC_ID = B.LEC_ID) INNER JOIN PLAN C ON(B.PLAN_NO = C.PLAN_NO) INNER JOIN SJT D ON(C.SJT_ID = D.SJT_ID) INNER JOIN LEC_ASSIGN E ON(C.PLAN_NO = E.PLAN_NO) WHERE A.USER_NO=#{userNo} AND A.LEC_SEMS=(SELECT SEMS_NO FROM SEMSDATA
WHERE SYSDATE >= SEMS_SDATE AND SYSDATE <= SEMS_EDATE)

SELECT A.USER_NO ,A.STU_YEAR ,B.USER_NAME ,C.DEPT_NAME FROM STU A INNER JOIN USERS B ON A.USER_NO=B.USER_NO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_ID=C.DEPT_ID INNER JOIN CLS D ON A.USER_NO = D.USER_NO WHERE D.LEC_ID = #{lecId} ORDER BY B.USER_NAME
